homeHeader.title: From Company Setup to Instant Account Access—Your Hassle-Free UAE Corporate Bank Account Opening Solution
homeHeader.description: Worried about high minimum balances, hidden fees, and costly banking traps? The wrong corporate bank account can eat into your cash flow, delay international payments, or hurt operational momentum. At One Nexuz, our experts guide you through every step, expediting approvals so you can focus on scaling effortlessly. Simplify transactions in AED, USD, and EUR, strengthen credibility with stakeholders, and save up on recurring international wire charges with the ideal UAE corporate bank account.

faq.title: Clear Answers, Expert Insights, Hassle Free Consulting Experience

items.question: Can foreign companies set up a corporate bank account in Dubai?
items.answer: Yes, our experts assist you in opening a 100% compliant business bank account to simplify cash flow management and multi-currency exchange.

items.question: What are the requirements to set up a corporate bank account in the UAE?
items.answer: You’ll need to provide relevant business documents and ensure compliance with the UAE’s regulatory requirements.

items.question: Do I need to earn a certain amount to open a corporate bank account?
items.answer: Yes, most UAE banks require a minimum deposit of AED 5,000 to AED 25,000, depending on your account type.

items.question: How long does it take to set up a corporate bank account?
items.answer: It can take anywhere from 1 to 21 days, depending on your jurisdiction, document readiness, and legal structure.

items.question: Do I need to show a salary certificate to set up a corporate bank account?
items.answer: No, you will not need to show salary slips or a certificate to open a business bank account. Our expert consultants can assist you in compiling and preparing the necessary documentation.
